ygData.messageBody:
--

>From: Darrian Ashoka
>
>Ah... fashion, one of my favorite topics.

Crown of the Froglok King -
(don't hold your breath waiting for me, I'm only
>level 33, Elyana will probably get hers before I do).


HA! Not with Miriana helping you get things Darrian! Hehe bet you have it
before me!
>
>>I do intend to get myself as close as I can to a full
>set of charred armor (black is one of my favorite
>colors)

GOOD choice, you'll look good in it:) Hmm found out if there is pants or
arms yet? Thats what I am missing.

>[who looks so much better when he uses the illusion
>on his Guise of the Deceiver. Humans didn't get much
>in the fashion deparment from Verant IMO.]


GRIN I got my mask last nite..it is SO COOL to be able to use the illusion
dark elf. I'm going to have fun being able to sell in ogguk now! LOL by
Bristleane I am looking forward to wreaking havok on the poor unsuspecting
merchants there!

Elyana Silvanae
Bardess of the 35th Chorus
Amabassador to the Ridgerunners
